00011 #define parent_index(i) ((i-1)/2)
00012 #define left_child_index(i) (1+2*i)
00013 
00014 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------

00019 int build_max_heap(int *a, int *b, double *x, int n, int *index, int *rev_index)
00020 {
00021   // builds a max-heap by max-heapifying all nodes with some children
00022 
00023   for (int i=(n>>1)-1; i>=0; i--)
00024     max_heapify(x,i,n,index,rev_index);
00025 
00026   // get back
00027 
00028   return n;
00029 };
00030 
00031 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00032 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00035 
00036 int max_heapify(double *x, int i, int n, int *index, int *rev_index)
00037 {
00038   double this_x=x[index[i]];
00039   int old_ii=index[i];
00040 
00041   int done=0;
00042   do {
00043     int c1=left_child_index(i);
00044     int c2=c1+1;
00045 
00046     int ic1=index[c1];
00047     
00048     if (c2<n)
00049       {
00050         int ic2=index[c2];
00051         
00052         if (x[ic1]<x[ic2])
00053           {
00054             ic1=ic2;
00055             c1=c2;
00056           };
00057       };
00058     
00059     if (x[ic1]>this_x)
00060       {
00061         index[i]=index[c1];
00062         rev_index[index[i]]=i;
00063         i=c1;
00064         if (left_child_index(i)>=n)
00065           done=1;
00066       }
00067     else
00068       done=1;
00069     
00070   } while (!done);
00071   
00072   index[i]=old_ii;
00073   rev_index[index[i]]=i;
00074 
00075   return i;
00076 };
00077

00079 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------

00082 
00083 int increase_key_max_heap(double *x, int i, double val, int n, int *index, int *rev_index)
00084 {
00085   x[i]=val;
00086   return float_up_max_heap(x,rev_index[i],n,index,rev_index);
00087 };

00089 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------

00093 
00094 int float_up_max_heap(double *x, int i, int n, int *index, int *rev_index)
00095 {
00096   double this_x=x[index[i]];
00097   int old_ii=index[i];
00098 
00099   int parent_idx=parent_index(i);
00100 
00101   while ((i>0)&&(this_x>x[index[parent_idx]]))
00102     {
00103       index[i]=index[parent_idx];
00104       rev_index[index[i]]=i;
00105       i=parent_idx;
00106       if (i>0)
00107         parent_idx=parent_index(i);
00108     };
00109 
00110   index[i]=old_ii;
00111   rev_index[index[i]]=i;
00112 
00113   return i;
00114 };
00115 
00116 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00117 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00118 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00120 
00121 int pop_max_heap(double *x, int &n, int *index, int *rev_index)
00122 {
00123   n--;
00124   int val=index[0];
00125 
00126   index[0]=index[n];
00127   rev_index[index[n]]=0;
00128   max_heapify(x,0,n,index,rev_index);
00129 
00130   return val;
00131 }

00138 void print_max_heap(double *x, int n, int *index, int *rev_index)
00139 {
00140   for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00141     {
00142       printf("x[%u] = %5.3f (",i,x[index[i]]);
00143       if (i*2+1<n)
00144         printf("%5.3f ",x[index[2*i+1]]);
00145       if (i*2+2<n)
00146         printf("%5.3f ",x[index[2*i+2]]);
00147       printf(")\n");
00148     };
00149 }

00151 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------

00155 
00156 int check_max_heap(double *x, int n, int *index, int *rev_index)
00157 {
00158   int ok=1;
00159 
00160   for (int i=0; (i<n)&&(ok); i++)
00161     {
00162       if (i*2+1<n)
00163         if (x[index[i]]<x[index[2*i+1]])
00164           ok=0;
00165 
00166       if (i*2+2<n)
00167         if (x[index[i]]<x[index[2*i+2]])
00168           ok=0;
00169     };
00170 
00171   if (ok==0)
00172     printf("not OK\n");
00173   else
00174     printf("OK\n");
00175 
00176   return ok;
00177 }
